body.name: JEHONN Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, Long Handle Lightweight 180 Degree Rotating Broom Set Indoor, Upright Standing Dust Pan with Comb Teeth, Store Sweep Set for Room Kitchen Office Lobby

features: UPGRADED FUNCTION: Two snaps on the broom head works with non-woven fabric for window cleaning, mopping, sweeping, etc. Besides, the broom is engineered 180°swivel head, making it easy to clean the bottom of beds, tables, or other blind angles.

STOP HURTING YOUR BACK: Upgraded dust pans with long handle can be extended to 46.5 inches, which allows you not only to stand upright for comfortable sweeping instead of bending over to clean but also to sweep dust from high places or deep corners.

KEEP YOUR HANDS CLEAN: The household brooms feature built-in comb teeth, ensuring dirt makes its way into the upright dustpan. No need to worry about polluting your hands to remove hairs (from yourself or your loving dog/cat) and other debris.

NO DUST LEFT UNDERNEATH: The lip on the dust pan long handled fits seamlessly to the ground, no dust or garbage would be left. It picks up everything, including the smallest particles, so you will finally save time cleaning - more time enjoying!

COMPACT STAND-UP STORAGE: When not using, the dustpan can slow-rebound without wasting any place, and you clip the broom to the dustpan handle. After that, hang the outdoor broom and dustpan on the wall via the hanging hole on the top of the handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best broom/dustpan around
reviews.reviewText: I have chronic back pain and bending over for most dustpans is NOT an option. For year, I had a different upright one with a handle, but sadly, it met its end of life and they no longer make it. I spent quite a bit of time searching for a new one. I bought this one and another one to compare the two and this JEHONN product is SUPERIOR.First, let's talk about ease of installation. The instructions are easy and the parts are interchangeable unlike the other comparison set.It is made well, durable, and the rotating broom allows me to get into those pesky kitchen baseboard corners.Finally, unlike other products I have purchased on Amazon, the company actually thanks you for purchasing their product, which seems to be a rarity these days.If you suffer from any kind of body ailment and need a solid broom/dustpan, I highly recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly not bad 👍
reviews.reviewText: To be far it does feel a little cheap and I don't expect it to last forever but honestly it's one of the best broom and dustpan combos I've ever used. It sits perfectly flat on my tile flooring at work and sweeping the extremely fine dust that we have is a breeze. You know how when your sweeping and you try super hard to just get that last line of dust into the pan but you give up and move the pan back a little bit and try to fling it in. I had no issue with this no re adjust just everything went into the pan. If this thing lasts me 2 years I'll be happy and will gladly buy another as long as they don't change anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good dustpan design
reviews.reviewText: I’ll tell you right up front what I like about this dustpan:1) the edge/lip of the dustpan makes good contact with the floor and doesn’t require a lot of re-sweeping to get the dirt pile into the pan.2) the top of the dustpan has a comb that strains the hair, fuzz, threads, grass, and other items from the bristles of the broom. What you sweep in stays in, because you comb it out. No more reaching down and pulling stuff out of the broom. No more dirty hands.3) the pan and the broom hang together as a unit4) the various color schemes are actually nicely thought-out.5) it’s lightweight but feels sturdy. Time will tell if it holds up. It also feels a little cheap.What I don’t like about it:The broom is hard to manage. Needs better grips along the handle. Probably should be an angled-broom, but just having a better grip would be nice.Overall, the broom and pan are well engineered. It’s a good buy, and the dustpan works better than any I’ve used, including Rubbermaid’s. The comb for the broom is so simple, but why didn’t anyone else do it until now?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: as brooms go, it serves its purpose...but 1:the bristles are too "soft" and as such sweeping on wood floors that are uneven is a chore. it can't grab the scraps well enough without multiple passes. 2: the swivel head i originally thought would be an asset...it is not. mainly because it swivels when you don't want it to. unless you sweep exactly straight, the head will turn and you must reach down and continually adjust it back. 3: the "adjustable length" is not truly "adjustable." the handle has multiple sections you screw together and the choice to leave off a section for the height. as a taller woman i thought this would be nice and to an extent it is...if it functioned properly that is. sadly it doesn't for while sweeping the sections come loose and the handle falls apart in your hands. very annoying to say the least. i will give credit to the dust bin for it does have a decent space to hold debris and seams to the floor pretty well so the debris goes easily inside. second good point is the dust bin handle has a clip to attach the broom to it for easy storage. overall for the price i guess i got what i paid for and it works good enough for an inside only quick small clean up tool. anything more, i would recommend a different broom set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BROOM ALL IN ONE
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprized at the quality and ease of use of this broom and dust pan set. I finally do NOT have to bend down! YAY! It is also for tall or shorter people based on how many additions you want to put together. Smart! I highly recommend- the price is right too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom was so easy to put together. It is very sturdy and light weight. I made it shorter for my use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not your normal broom, but it does a great job
reviews.reviewText: If you are getting this expecting a normal broom, it's not but the doesn't mean that it isn't great.The bristles on this are very soft and bend easy, unlike other brooms that I have that have hard bristles.If this is the only broom that you are getting, it's not going to be handy for heavy things like on a work site. But if you are getting this just to pick up the minor things that get on the floor, this is the broom for you.It handles very fine dust amazingly, much better than the other brooms can handle. It is much easier to sweep the dust into the pan with the soft bristles than the hard ones.They both have their place and needed, but anything that I sweep up with the heavy broom, this some comes in to put it in the dustpan.and the extra feature on the dustpan to take hair or whatever gets stuck is equally amazing.
I like that the handles are the same size as a normal broom, makes things much easier to clean up

Me encantó el recogedor es muy estable y plano al piso nada se le va por abajo ni el más Pequeño polvillo todo entra, el clip que trae para unir escoba y recogedor puedes adosar una escoba de la que tengas y eso es fabuloso la escoba es muy pequeña y bastante suave me gustaría que tubiera otro tramo de Extencion solo uno puede ser alto la escoba o el recogedor uno queda muy bajito. eso si, tu eliges cual. La escoba jira ligeramente al estar barriendo y eso es poquita molestia, para mí es una escoba auxiliar para lugares especiales pequeños por su ligeresa de cerdas y tamañito aunque puedes barrer si problemas la casa. esté dúo cabe perfecto en un lugarsito de mi alacena eso es fantástico, eso buscaba

reviews.reviewTitle: Un excellent outil pour ménager le dos
reviews.reviewText: Ce balai et cette pelle sont très efficaces. Ils permettent de ramasser parfaitement toute poussière. Les dents à l'avant de la pelle débarrassent le balai des moutons et des cheveux accrochés en un geste simple. Léger et maniable. Evite de sortir l'aspirateur trop souvent. Excellent quand on a tendance à avoir mal au dos !

Questa scpoa è piccola ma molto valida,arriva dappertutto,comodi i buchetti superiori per mettere un panno acchiappapolvere .Manico bello lungo .La paletta è bella,grande ,con trasparenze per vedere dentro ,si chiude bene e sta in piedi grazie al piedino dietro .Sono contenta ,un bell'acquisto .Lo consiglio
